recipesJson.name: Chocolate Cake
recipesJson.author: RUG_ly
recipesJson.description:
CAP Vanilla Cupcake is a really good cake on its own. At 4% you get a nice fluffy white cake with a little bit of vanilla frosting. I’ve added the TFA Vanilla Custard II to add to the depth and make it a little darker.

MB Glamour Chocolate works well in bakeries such as this one. It’s a medium dark chocolate that benefits from the mouth feel of the cake and custard. 

Watch the Video Here: 
https://youtu.be/4WploIH0Ti8
